lead_paragraph: After initially denying that he had bitten Italy’s Giorgio Chiellini, Luis Suárez of Uruguay admitted he had and apologized via Twitter on Monday.
snippet: After initially denying that he had bitten Italy’s Giorgio Chiellini, Luis Suárez of Uruguay admitted he had and apologized via Twitter on Monday.
